content: Improves skin elasticity, preventing the appearance of facial wrinkles.
Protects the Skin from UV radiation, acting as an Antioxidant.
Prevents the appearance of dry skin.
Provides support to the cardiovascular system.
Collagen can strengthen, improve density, and prevent hair loss.
Aids the digestive system, helping reconstitute the gastrointestinal walls.
Supports nails, avoiding brittle and yellowish nails.
Reduces the appearance of stretch marks and orange peel skin.
Boosts the regeneration and repair of Cartilage, Tendons, and Bones.
